text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Eh？……do a mock race, right now？ Comin' all the way out to the Oi racetrack……and to top it off, in front of a crowd！

text_block_list.name: Townsfolk
text_block_list.text: Ufufu, Inari-chan！！ The Chief told us, so we came to watch～！！

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: Well, aren't they lively？ The ones you're facin', just like you, they're all plannin' on joinin' me. Now's as good a time as ever to face off, right？

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ain't that too sudden！？ But, well, I'll do it if the Chief says so……！

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: Yeah, please do. ……Alright, go get changed.
Seems like the 『Race』 the Chief wanted me to see……was this one, a mock race between Inari One and the newer team members.
Taking a look around, it looks like the Chief had called out several people from the town. The soba stall old lady, that shopkeeper from the festival, and even that boss cat……
With everyone in high-spirits looking on――the race began.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (A mock race with the Uma Musume who joined recently…… I get it, but isn't it too soon？ Besides, why would ya tell me only on the day of？ Hmmmmm……)

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (――can't get distracted, I need to focus！ She's runnin' energetically, but she should be runnin' out of stamina soon, right？ I'll make my move……！)

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Uu……oOOOOOOOOOH！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (！？ She's not……fallin' behind！？)

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: I…… ran out of stamina again, and got 5th though……

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Zeee haaa haaa haaa…… GaaAAAAAAAAA！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Hey hey！ This girl…… she's completely different from before, ain't she！？)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Kuu……！ Come, onnnnn！！

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Guuuuuuu……！ Not yet……not yet, not yet, not yeeeeeeeeeet！！
Surprisingly, it looked like Inari One was being overwhelmed！ With 200m left, at this rate……！
The moment I thought that――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: DeeEEEEERyaaAAAAAAAーーー！！
Until the very last moment she was just one step behind, but―― At the end, narrowly by a nose, Inari One was able to pull ahead and take first……

text_block_list.name: Inari and Others
text_block_list.text: Zeee, haaa, haaa, haaa！！

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Naaaaaaaaa, daaaaaaamnitーーー！！ I lostーーーー！！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa……N-no, but…… you, when did ya……make it this far……！？

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: It was close. But, well――do ya get it now, Inari？

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: I don't need somethin' like you payin' back your debts. Even without ya―― this place, has youngsters like her who will support it.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ！？ Eh……Chief！！ What the heck are ya sayin' all of a sudden！？ I'll be at the Chief's place, and enter Oi races――

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: What are ya sayin', ya moron！？ ……Do ya think I haven't noticed？ It's obvious ya had a change of heart.

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: Ya want to go to Tracen Academy, don't ya？ Stop doin' somethin' miserable like bottlin' it up and bearin' it.

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: If you're an Edo kid from the rough side of town！ Go to the big stage of the Twinkle Series, stir it up, and make some big waves！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……！ C……Chief……！！

text_block_list.name: Soba-stand Old Lady
text_block_list.text: That's right！ If it's for Inari-chan, I'll go wherever to cheer her on！！

text_block_list.name: Shopkeeper Old Man
text_block_list.text: The Edo Kid, Inari has arrived！ On that big stage, go knock their socks off！！

text_block_list.name: Townsfolk
text_block_list.text: WaaAAAAAAA！！ Inari！ Inari！ Inari！ Inari！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Everyone……

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: ……Hmph, what's with that mopey look on your face？ C'mon, get goin' already！

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: You've already got a partner, don't ya？ That race just now……the reason ya could pull through at the end, it's not like ya haven't realized it.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Chief……Yeah. ……Yeah, I got it！！
And so――several weeks later.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hey hey hey hey. I'm comin' in！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: A workin' class girl, from a workin' class town！！ And now a student at Tracen Academy, the Edo Kid, Inari, refers to me！！……ya see！？
choice_data_list: Inari One……！ I was waiting for you！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Just Inari is fine, let's keep it casual. Since, from now on, we're gonna be on the same long～road together. Right, Boss！？
choice_data_list: Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！
Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Just Inari is fine, let's keep it casual. Since, from now on, we're gonna be on the same long～road together. Right, Boss！？
choice_data_list: Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！
Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: That's what I'm talkin' about！！ Alright――once more, I'm here from Oi to stir things up at the Twinkle Series！！
